translations: 更年期；转折点，危机期；（苹果等果实成熟时的）呼吸跃变
关键的；更年期的；重要时期的；（果实成熟时）呼吸跃变的

phrs.translation: 更年期综合征，更年期综合症

sentences.sentence: This has been termed the "respiration climacteric".
Objective: To investigate the mental status of climacteric women.
sentences.translation: 目的：了解更年期妇女心理健康状况。

sentences.sentence: Purpose To observe the curative effect of acupuncture on female climacteric syndrome.
sentences.translation: 目的观察针刺治疗女性更年期综合征的疗效。
